top_income_rate: Ordinary Income Taxes and Payroll Taxes

tax_wedge: Ratio of Marginal to Average Tax Wedge
personal_surtax: Income Tax Complexity (Surtax rate on personal income)
personal_other_rev: Income Tax Complexity (Share of revenue collected through non-standard social security and payroll taxes) (c)
capital_gains_rate: Top Marginal Capital Gains Tax Rate (b)

country: (a) Multiple of the average income at which the highest tax bracket applies, in U.S. dollars in Purchasing Power Parity (PPP).
(b) After any imputation, credit, or offset. Includes surtaxes.
